title: LLM KeyVault
description: A secure place to manage your LLM API keys.
brandDescription: Securely manage and use your LLM API keys.
searchPlaceholder: Search by nickname, platform, or tags...

meta.title: LLM KeyVault - Secure API Key Management
meta.description: A modern web application for securely managing and storing LLM API keys. Supports multiple LLM platforms with an intuitive interface for managing your API keys.
meta.keywords: LLM, API key, key management, OpenAI, Anthropic, ChatGPT, Claude, key vault, API management
meta.author: LLM KeyVault

addKeyForm.title: Add a New API Key
addKeyForm.description: Enter the details of your new API key below.
addKeyForm.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields.
addKeyForm.customPlatformDomainRequired: Domain is required for custom platforms.

keyList.noResults: No keys found for your search.
keyList.addFirstKey: Get started by adding your first API key.
keyList.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your API key.

importExport.title: Import / Export Keys
importExport.description: Export your keys to a JSON file or import them from a backup.
importExport.exportDescription: Download all your keys as a single JSON file.
importExport.importDescription: Select a JSON file to import keys. This will overwrite all existing keys.
